source:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
A new rumor has the dwarves of Komra in a right tizzy.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête
Ce Nain a sûrement des choses intéressantes à raconter.

TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the dig site watch.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_00<tab>Parler au surveillant de mine, au sud-est de Komra

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the dig site chief.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Anogg.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_03<tab>Search for the automaton core.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the automaton core to Anogg.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_05<tab>Search for the mining lantern.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_05<tab>Obtenir <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8FD50202 /var>, dans les montagnes des Duergars

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_06<tab>Deliver the mining lantern to the dig site chief.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_07<tab>Speak with the gossipy dwarf.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_07<tab>Faire un rapport au Nain colporteur de rumeurs, à Tomra

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_23<tab>

TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_001<tab>You heard the latest rumor out of Komra? The strangest find in recent memory, though actual details as to what said find actually is have yet to emerge.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_001<tab>Psst... T'es au courant<var 1D /var>? Y s'murmure çà et là que les Gogg auraient découvert un filon pas banal, près de Komra... Tu voudrais pas aller jeter un œil pour moi<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_002<tab>If you do happen to come into any juicy tidbits, I'd be keen to hear 'em. The suspense is killing me here...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_002<tab>Oublie pas de m'tenir au jus quand t'en sauras plus. Ah, j'ai hâte de savoir ce qu'ils ont déniché<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_003<tab>Remember: I'm the one what put you on the scent! So if you learn any exciting secrets, you'd best share them with me! 'Tis only fair!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_003<tab>Oublie pas de m'tenir au jus quand t'en sauras plus. Ah, j'ai hâte de savoir ce qu'ils ont déterré<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_050<tab>I can neither confirm nor deny the existence of a new discovery of untold value that only a select few are allowed to see for themselves.

TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_051<tab>That said...there may come a time when I find myself utterly fascinated by that pile of rocks over there and would be completely oblivious to anyone attempting to sneak past...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_051<tab>Enfin personne... sauf ceux qui savent se montrer généreux.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_052<tab>...
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_053<tab>...You're a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of the world, ain't you? Don't make me say it plain.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_053<tab>Quoi, me dis pas que j'ai besoin de te faire un dessin<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_054<tab>Wicked white! How bloody stupid are you!?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_055<tab>You─the imbecile─give me─the guard─ten thousand gil. Then you─the imbecile─get to walk past me─the guard─and see the amazing find. Got it?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_055<tab>J'te parle de grisbi, de pépettes<var 1D /var>! Envoie la monnaie... disons une patate, et j'te laisserai passer<var 1D /var>! <var 1A 02 /var>Capisce<var 1A 01 /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q1_000_000<tab>Bribe the guard?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_057<tab>Then you do not get to pass. You go away! Good day, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_057<tab>Ben tu sauras jamais ce qu'il y a derrière cette porte. Na<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_058<tab>Heh heh, about time you started playing by the rules...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_058<tab>Gnark, gnark... Tu vois qu'on peut s'arranger<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_059<tab>Lali-what in the blazing hells do you think you're doing man-ho!? Is that any way for a guard to behave? Is it!?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_059<tab>Hé, toi<var 1D /var>! On te paie pour bosser, pas pour tailler la bavette<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_060<tab>N-N-No sir, Chief! Sir!
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_061<tab>No rations for you tonight!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_061<tab>Pas de dîner pour toi ce soir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_062<tab>Chief, no! Mercy! Meeeeeercy!

TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_063<tab>It's...<sniffle>...it's not fair, I tell you... A dwarf toils day in and day out for a pittance, only to try and make a little something extra on the side, and what does it get him... <sob>
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_063<tab>Beuheuheu... J'en ai marre de m'faire exploiter comme un larbin... Si seulement j'avais du pognon...

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_064<tab>Right, well, anyway─bugger off. None may pass without the Chief's permission, which I know you haven't got.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_064<tab>Écoute, si tu veux passer, essaye de t'arranger avec le patron. Moi, je m'suis assez fait engueuler pour la journée...

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_065<tab>Oh look, it's the sinner who cost me my dinner. Go hassle the chief if you want to go in, 'cause I sure as hells ain't letting you pass.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_065<tab>Écoute, si tu veux passer, essaye de t'arranger avec le patron. Moi, je m'suis assez fait engueuler pour la journée...

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_070<tab>No time for you, friend. We've our hands full with this latest find of ours...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_070<tab>On vient de dénicher un nouveau filon pas piqué des vers... Mais chut<var 1D /var>! J'ai pas envie que les Tholl rappliquent...

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_100<tab>Wait, wait, don't tell me. I assume you came all this way to put in for the position? Sorry, but it's already been filled.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_100<tab>Laisse-moi deviner, tu viens pour le poste, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? Désolé, mais on a déjà trouvé quelqu'un.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A2_000_001<tab>Came all this way for the what-now?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A2_000_002<tab>You know what they say about assumptions...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A2_000_002<tab>Qu'est-ce qu'il y a derrière cette porte<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_102<tab>Eh? Don't go playing silly buggers with me. The queer ruins we found deep in a cavern through a tunnel over there! The one filled with all kinds of machina? To the point we've started calling it a bloody machina graveyard?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_102<tab>Quoi, t'es pas au courant<var 1D /var>? On a découvert de drôles de vestiges au fond de la grotte, juste derrière cette porte. Mes gars et moi, on a baptisé l'endroit les “ruines mécaniques”, parce qu'on y trouve tout plein de pièces de métal.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_103<tab>Yes, well, we were looking to hire on another guard, but the position's since been filled by that fellow what tried to swindle you a moment ago.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_103<tab>Au cas où quelqu'un voudrait nous en chiper, j'ai engagé ce type pour faire le piquet devant l'entrée. Ça fait pile-poil une semaine qu'il est là.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_104<tab>So you're out of luck, I'm afraid. But chin up, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Your time'll come round again soon enough.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_104<tab>J'suis comme ça, moi, j'aime bien recruter du monde. Ça fait tourner l'économie.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_105<tab>Since you're here and still unemployed, mind delivering a message for me? It's for two younglings in Komra, Anogg and Konogg─sister and brother, twins. Fond of wearing white and black. Twin thing, I suppose.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_105<tab>Dommage, j'ai pas de boulot pour toi. Par contre, tu peux me rendre un service<var 1D /var>: au village, y a des jumeaux, un frère et une sœur, qui s'appellent Konogg et Anogg.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_100_105<tab>The message is as follows: “Lali-bleeding-ho! This is no place for children to be messing about! Stay far, far, far away, or else!” Got it?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_100_105<tab>Ces deux garnements arrêtent pas de fourrer leur nez par ici. Si tu pouvais leur dire que cette grotte est pas un terrain de jeu, ça m'arrangerait.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_110<tab>If I told you several times before you're not getting in, what makes you think I've since changed my mind? I mean, think about it...
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_115<tab>Anogg and Konogg, wearing white and black. You'll know 'em when you see 'em. And don't forget the lali-bleeding-ho!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_115<tab>Si tu pouvais dire à Konogg et Anogg que cette grotte est pas un terrain de jeu, ça m'arrangerait.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_150<tab>Hm? You got business with us?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_100_150<tab>...The chief put you up to this? And you <var 1A 02 /var>agreed<var 1A 01 /var>? Haven't you got anything better to do with your time?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_100_150<tab>Un message du porion<var 1D /var>? Plus tard, on est occupés, là.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_151<tab>Wait...those garments...that quiet confidence...those powerful neck muscles sculpted by a lifetime of nodding...
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_152<tab>(This is that sinner everyone's been talking about, Sister! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var>'s the guileless fool we've been waiting for! The perfect patsy!)
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_152<tab>(Psst... <var 08 E905 ((Cette femme)) ((Cet homme)) /var>, ça doit être <var 08 E905 ((une)) ((un)) /var> des <var 08 E905 ((étrangères)) ((étrangers)) /var> dont parlaient les rumeurs... <var 08 E905 ((Elle)) ((Il)) /var> pourrait nous être utile.)

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_153<tab>(Good thinking, Brother. Let's get right to it, then!)
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_153<tab>(Ah c'est vrai, maintenant que tu le dis<var 1D /var>! Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment que tu es là, Konogg.)

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_154<tab>Ah... Ahem! You wouldn't happen to be that kindly stranger everyone likes and adores? You are, aren't you!? Perhaps you would be willing to do us a teensy little favor? Of course you would!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_154<tab>Ahem. Ravie de vous rencontrer, <var 08 E905 ((étrangère)) ((étranger)) /var>. Dites, est-ce qu'on peut vous demander une petite faveur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_155<tab>My brother and I are conducting some highly secret research at the moment, but we've hit a dead end. To continue, we need to get our hands on an automaton core...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_155<tab>Mon frère et moi, on mène des recherches top-secrètes, et on aurait pour cela besoin d'<var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8FD40202 /var>. Vous pourriez nous en rapporter un<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A3_000_001<tab>...So I'm to be your patsy?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A3_000_002<tab>Good luck with that.

TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_157<tab>Oh, don't be silly! Everyone knows you're the soul of generosity! A sinner who cannot help but render aid to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> fellow sinner in their hour of need! Not for fame or fortune or any other reward, but simply for the joy of it! Am I wrong?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_157<tab>Allez quoi, soyez sympa. On dit que les étrangers adorent rendre service<var 1D /var>; que vous ne pouvez pas vous empêcher d'aider les personnes dans le besoin. C'est pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A4_000_001<tab>...This is another one of those moments where it really doesn't matter what I have to say, isn't it?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A4_000_002<tab>Oh, sod this.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_159<tab>How rude!
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_160<tab>So rude!

TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_161<tab>But despite your vehement refusal, deep down we both know you cannot help but aid us in our endeavor. 'Tis your nature. We will pretend that you agreed without a fuss and that will be the end of it.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_161<tab>Enfin, vous avez beau dire, ça crève les yeux qu'au fond de vous, vous avez envie de nous aider. Inutile de le nier.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_162<tab>Now you're on the trolley.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_163<tab>The core we require is being stored with other sundry materials on the cliffs above us. Once you have it, bring it to my sister.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_163<tab>Il devrait y avoir des noyaux dans le petit dépôt de matériel, au nord de Komra. Essayez d'en prendre un dis<var 16 /var>crè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_165<tab>As soon as you have that automaton core, bring it to me straightaway.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_170<tab>Don't dally, sinner! We need that core for our research!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_170<tab>Il devrait y avoir des noyaux dans le petit dépôt de matériel, au nord de Komra. Essayez d'en prendre un dis<var 16 /var>crè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_180<tab>Can't you see we're in the middle of a very important conversation?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_180<tab>Faut pas nous déranger, Anogg et moi. On est en pleine réunion stratégique.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_200<tab>You gave 'em the ol' lali-bleeding-ho, did you? Hope they took it to heart.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_200<tab>J'espère que les jumeaux t'ont pas embêté<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_250<tab>Ahh, there's the sinner now!
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_251<tab>And is that the core I spy in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> hot little hands?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_251<tab>Vous avez ce qu'on vous a demandé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_252<tab>Heh heh heh, brilliant! All we've got to do is sell this for a small fortune, and then we'll be one step closer to seeing our plans for world domination to fruition...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_252<tab>Merci bien<var 1D /var>! Grâce à vous, nous venons de faire un grand pas vers la conquête du mon...

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_253<tab>(Oi, Anogg! Lali-nay on the domination-ho!)
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_253<tab>Chhht<var 1D /var>! Ne lui dis pas, Anogg<var 1D /var>! C'est notre secret.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_254<tab>(Oh, right! That was a close one, Brother!)
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_254<tab>Oups, ça m'a échappé. Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment que tu es là, Konogg.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_255<tab>Now then, for our next request...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_255<tab>Bon, qu'est-ce qu'on va vous demander maintenant...

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_256<tab>Lali-what in the hells are you two up to-ho!? If you're even thinking of taking advantage of this good sinner, I'll tan both your hides and toss you from the top of White Oil Falls! Now get you gone!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_256<tab>Ah, j'vous y reprends tous les deux, à embêter les adultes<var 1D /var>! Arrêtez-ça tout de suite, ou je vous chatouille avec mon marteau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_257<tab>(-Anogg and Konogg-)Sir, yes, sir!
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_258<tab>Sorry about that. They don't know any better, on account of them being all on their own. No parents.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_258<tab>Navré s'ils t'ont fait tourner en bourrique.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_259<tab>They've lost more than most, you could say. More than anyone ever should.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_259<tab>Faut pas leur en vouloir, ces petiots ont pas de parents...

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_260<tab>Anyway, I've been meaning to ask. Everyone says you're the soul of generosity─a sinner who cannot help but render aid to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> fellow sinner in their hour of need. Not for fame or fortune or any other reward, but simply for the joy of it. Am I wrong?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_260<tab>De toute façon, vous autres étrangers adorez vous rendre utiles, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A5_000_002<tab>I'd swear you just repeated nearly word for word what those two...never mind.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A5_000_002<tab>Mais d'où vient cette idée reçue<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_262<tab>We're short a lantern at the dig site. Should be another in the cave just outside of the village. Mind going and fetching it for me? 'Course you don't.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_262<tab>... Ça tombe bien, j'ai justement besoin d'un coup de main. Je voudrais que t'ailles me chercher <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8FD50202 /var> dans la grotte à l'ouest du village.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_263<tab>Once you've got it, bring it to me back at the dig. Oh, and don't worry─I'll see you compensated for the trouble.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_263<tab>Moi, j'vais retourner à l'entrée des ruines mécaniques. Rapporte-moi la lampe et j'te récompenserai pour ta peine. Allez, à toute<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_265<tab>Got that lantern for me? No? It should be in the cave just outside of town.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_265<tab>Alors cette lampe, ça vient<var 1D /var>? T'as regardé dans la grotte, à l'ouest de Komra<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_350<tab>There you are. I presume that lantern you're holding's for yours truly?
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_351<tab>Much obliged. Here─a little something for your trouble.
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_352<tab>Never let it be said a dwarf of character doesn't pay his debts. Anyway, if we've nothing else to discuss...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_352<tab>Tu devrais être <var 08 E905 ((contente)) ((content)) /var> avec ça. Maintenant tu m'excuseras, mais j'ai du boulot...

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_353<tab>Just let us pass already!
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_354<tab>We want to see the ruins! Please please please please please!?

TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_355<tab>No, no, no, no, no. It's dangerous and off-limits and even if I were the sort of man who could be bribed─which I'm not─I'd be shocked if you two had anything valuable enough for me to risk my neck looking the other way.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_355<tab>Non, non et non<var 1D /var>! Je vous ai déjà dit que c'est trop dangereux.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_356<tab>Why are you and everyone else so bloody obsessed with trying to get a look at the cavern filled with mysterious machina anyway? It's just a bloody scrap heap, isn't it?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_356<tab>C'est fou, ça. Qu'est-ce que vous avez tous, à vouloir entrer là-dedans<var 1D /var>? Y a rien à voir, à part de la ferraille. Enfin, à ce que je sache...

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_357<tab>No no─it's so much more! Based on our research, we have reason to believe that those ruins contain─
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_358<tab>(Hush, Sister! How many times must you nearly give the game away!? It's supposed to be our secret!)
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_359<tab>(Oh, yes, right. Right. It's just so hard sometimes to contain my enthusiasm...)
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_360<tab>Nothing. These ruins contain nothing of value whatsoever. We shall leave you to your affairs, honorable guard sir, and bid thee farewell.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_360<tab>Bon, on ne va pas vous déranger plus longtemps. On s'en va.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_361<tab>Honestly, I'm beginning to hope that there really is nothing of value in there, for all the trouble it's causing. But as I was about to say─if we've got nothing else to discuss, then you'd best be on your way. It's dangerous to wander about an active dig, and I don't want anyone getting hurt.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_361<tab>Ah vraiment, ces deux-là... Au passage, l'in<var 16 /var>ter<var 16 /var>dic<var 16 /var>tion vaut pour toi aussi. Reste à l'écart des ruines mécaniques si tu veux pas te prendre un bout de ferraille sur la tête.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_370<tab>What does it matter to you if we go through? It's not like it's your find! You have nothing to lose!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_370<tab>Laissez-nous passer<var 1D /var>! On perd du temps, là<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_371<tab>You really must let us through. It's a matter of the utmost importance!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_371<tab>On a une mission à accomplir dans ces vestiges...

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_372<tab>...What in the hells are you two on about?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_372<tab>Qu'est-ce qu'ils ont à rouspéter, ces deux-là<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_400<tab>Poked around Komra, did you? Learn anything about that big find?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_400<tab>Tu reviens de Komra<var 1D /var>!? Alors, t'as pu zieuter leur nouveau filon<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_401<tab>A machine graveyard, eh? Interesting, interesting... This could be the beginning of a great and grand adventure. Or an utterly nonsensical one─though that does have its appeal on occasion, I'll allow.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_401<tab>... Des ruines mécaniques, hein... C'est dommage qu'ils t'aient pas laissé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> entrer, j'aurais voulu savoir quel genre de ressources on y trouve... Merci quand même.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_410<tab>Folks ought to keep busy, that's my motto. Idle hands are the fae's playthings.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_410<tab>On me reproche souvent de trop bosser, mais c'est comme ça que j'arrive à garder un esprit sain dans un corps sain. Tu sais ce qu'on dit<var 1D /var>: l'oisiveté est la mère de tous les vices.

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_411<tab>Wicked white, if you start pestering me like those twins to get inside... <sigh> I tell you, what's the point of being a guard if you can't profit off it? Why would anyone ever take this job?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_411<tab>On ne passe pas<var 1D /var>! Ah, si j'étais riche...
